name: Depths of Chaos
description:
Hi! this game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam.

I have recently been playing Muck, and was inspired by the "Let there be Chaos" theme to make a game that gets more chaotic as you spend time in the dungeon.

As it stands there are a lot of bugs, but I plan to continue to work on the game and fix them. 

Bugs to expect - 

 - Enemies clip into each other making a huge cluster of enemies looking like one.

- Two separate tracks of music play occasionally when entering Dungeon.

- Chance to get stuck outside of map

- Sometimes bullets lack velocity and just sit there. Will be destroyed by timer, but doesn't look good.

                 --- Planned Updates --- 

-Arrow Key Movement

-Fix above bugs

-Procedural dungeon generation

-Tutorial

-Shop for cosmetics

- More Enemies

- More Weapons

Enjoy!

Credit to Abstraction for game music - 
http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/ 

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Font used - https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html

Random Particle Effects  by NYKNCK- https://kvsr.itch.io/

Majority of Game Art - https://moose-stache.itch.io/pixel-roguelite-asset-pack
